attributes.action: endorse a global strike to begin on monday 18th june 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose being that if the 'cogs' of the machine cease to turn then the machine itself will come to a standstill. We are destroying this earth and need to evaluate why we are carrying on with a system that doesn't work anymore.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
